Trade/Device Name(s): Innovacon FlipcardTM Fecal Occult Blood Test Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Innovacon FlipcardTM rapid immunoassay for qualitative detection of fecal occult blood using monoclonal antibodies
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid qualitative detection of human hemoglobin in fecal samples, aiding in screening for lower GI bleeding related to iron deficiency anemia, peptic ulcer, ulcerative colitis, polyp, and colorectal cancer; recommended for health professionals in routine exams and monitoring in hospitals or physician offices
